title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes take effect immediately.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
EB: When a working set is removed, the package view should still be filtered.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Verify that the package view is filtered. 2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. 3. Delete the first working set and verify that the package view remains filtered.
